column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The restaurant serves a varied
column2: interesting menu and the cafe also has very tasty treats so there is something for everyone. The Member's Lounge always has coffee and tea
column3: with hot chocolate in the colder months. There is also a bar in there and comfortable seating so we often take a break from Michigan Ave just to come in and relax. The gift shop is a great place to find something unusual for yourself or someone special.
